title: The Day I Plunged Into Rough Waters

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
My heart pounds out of my chest. I feel the disgusting sensation 
of beads of sweat dripping down my face. There's the sense that 
making a single choice could define the rest of your life. 
Impatience, confusion, hesitation…

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Ahh. It's the worst and it feels incredible. Now, let the 
pulse-pounding gamble begin.

It's been a few months since I arrived at Tracen Academy 
as a new trainer. Even if my time has been pretty mundane 
so far, I'm getting the hang of my job.

That said, I was still very unfamiliar with this area that I had 
decided to take a walk to, just trying to stretch my legs.
choice_data_list: (I shouldn't linger on a street like this…)
(I shouldn't linger on a street like this…)

text_block_list.text:
I had wound up in an area that seemed pretty suspicious. 
I turn around to get back to the main street as soon as 
possible, but ——

text_block_list.name: Delinquent A
text_block_list.text:
Don't try to run! You're Nakayama, the gal who trashed 
this place a while back, ain't ya?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
…Tch. Already washed my hands of that. 
Don't try to start anything with me.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text:
You say that, but you've made quite the name 
for yourself 'round here. Even the boss thinks 
you got more guts than we do.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text:
When I challenged you to a match before you said, "I'm on 
a completely different level than you. You should quit while 
you're ahead." …Like seriously…

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text:
…My reputation's ruined, and it's all your fault! 
So stop messin' around and fight me!

The Umamusume's ears flatten in response to the angry voice. 
At that moment, my body moves before I can think.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent A
text_block_list.text: Wha!?

text_block_list.name: Delinquent A
text_block_list.text:
Can't believe you're filling in for Nakayama. 
Have you even played Chicken before?
choice_data_list: (I never thought it would end up like this…)

text_block_list.text:
Before I know what's happening, I find myself playing 
a game of Chicken against the delinquents.

I feel the sound of the motorcycle engine through my entire 
body as I straddle the borrowed motorcycle and put on the 
helmet I was given. It seems like it'll fit well enough.
choice_data_list:
(Now all I have to do is twist the 
accelerator with my right hand…)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Your hands are shaking. You gonna be able to drive like that?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
If you're scared, get outta here. I'm just a stranger. You don't 
have any obligation to help and don't owe me anything.
choice_data_list: <size=32>That doesn't mean I can overlook what's happening!</size>

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …Haah…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
…Every once in a while, a good-natured idiot like you shows up 
to stick their nose into things they don't understand…

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text: The rules are simple. You hit the brakes first? You lose.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text:
After this test of courage is over, I promise I'll leave 
Nakayama be. That good with you?

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text: Of course… if you make it out alive.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
…Tch. Your head is filled with unnecessary thoughts. 
Hey, you. Listen up before you go blue in the face.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
If you can't tell if you're scared or not, don't hit the brakes. 
There's no need to hesitate. Cross the line of death and it 
becomes just another line.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Get rid of the unnecessary baggage that is fear. 
Fly free of that weight. Stay on the offensive and 
focus only on victory.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent A
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, by the time you start you'll be goin' 
barely faster than a crawl! Well, at least try 
to make your loss a spectacular one, yeah?

The delinquents stare at us with smug grins on their faces. 
Then, the person acting as a referee threw a pebble to the 
ground in place of a signal.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text: LET'S GOOOOO!!!

text_block_list.name: Delinquent A
text_block_list.text:
Ah?! That guy is doing the same thing as 
the leader! Fully revved from the get go!

text_block_list.name: Delinquent A
text_block_list.text: Hey, are you stupid?! That idiot's gonna crash into the ocean!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text: Ack! I can't go any further… dammit…!
choice_data_list: (He hit the brakes! Now, it's my turn!)
(He hit the brakes! Now, it's my turn!)

text_block_list.text:
I brake at the perfect moment. I was a lot closer 
to the ocean than the other bike.

The sudden jerk forward had thrown my body into the air. 
I feel the blood drain from my face.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hold your breath!

She was the only thing moving in the suspended 
landscape, gaining speed with every step as she 
bounded into the sky.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: RAAAAHHHHHHHH!!

She pulls me back and I catch my breath. In the distance, 
I hear the sound of a motorcycle falling into the sea.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hah… hah….hahaha! Well this sucks. I'm soaking wet!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …But I'm alive. Hahaa, aaahh… I can hear my heart pounding….
choice_data_list: <size=32>T-thank you… by the way, do you know who won…?</size>

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
…! Heheh, all that and you're still thinking 
about that game? Ridiculous.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent Leader
text_block_list.text: Hey, get the bike! Hurry up!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: You win for making such a mess. Now let's dip!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: You should know the way back from here. See ya.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: … Damn, my heart's still racing. Hahaha…
choice_data_list: W-wait! I didn't get your name ——
W-wait! I didn't get your name ——

text_block_list.text:
I tried to thank her again, but the Umamusume turned her back 
towards me, waved her hand, and never looked back.

I hadn't seen her since, even when I 
took the path through that alleyway.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Huff…
…I found her running a tryout race.
